item.title: Adventures In Scala - Part 1: play-scala-intro
item.description: Learning Scala Part 1 - play-scala-intro So, as of writing this, my background is primarily C#. This post is the first part of a series which will document my transition into all things Scala. I will be writing a step by step on creating a simple web stack. My Setup I’ll be using Linux Mint 17.3, but most flavours of debian should work for any of my bash. PostgreSQL 9.3.11 IntelliJ IDEA, targeting Open JDK 1.
